languages.text: Чтобы атаковать, выберите иконку одиночного выстрела на панели оружия с помощью {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Наведитесь на противника — на всплывающей панели будет указан {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} и возможный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в случае успешной атаки. Нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} на противнике, чтобы выстрелить. Урон зависит от параметров выбранного оружия. Также на {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффективность{/g} выстрела влияет дистанция — при наведении одиночного выстрела вы увидите две области с эффективной и максимальной дальностью стрельбы.

traits.locale_text:
Чтобы атаковать, выберите иконку одиночного выстрела на панели оружия с помощью {console_bind|DPadX}. Наведите курсор на противника — на всплывающей панели будет указан шанс попадания и возможный урон в случае успешной атаки. Нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} на противнике, чтобы выстрелить.
Урон зависит от параметров выбранного оружия. Также на эффективность выстрела влияет дистанция — при наведении одиночного выстрела вы увидите две области с эффективной и максимальной дальностью стрельбы.
??? чтобы узнать подробности расчёта.
Узнайте больше об областях дистанции стрельбы в энциклопедии: Области стрельбы.

languages.text: To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.
languages.original_text: Чтобы атаковать, выберите иконку одиночного выстрела на панели оружия с помощью {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Наведитесь на противника — на всплывающей панели будет указан {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} и возможный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в случае успешной атаки. Нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} на противнике, чтобы выстрелить. Урон зависит от параметров выбранного оружия. Также на {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффективность{/g} выстрела влияет дистанция — при наведении одиночного выстрела вы увидите две области с эффективной и максимальной дальностью стрельбы.

traits.locale_text: To attack, first select the single shot icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadX}. Target an enemy — a pop-up will appear showing your chances of hitting the enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

To attack, first select the single shot icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadX}. Target an enemy — a pop-up will appear showing your chances of hitting that enemy and the possible damage you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The effectiveness of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

languages.text: Para atacar, selecciona primero el icono de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}ataque de un solo disparo{/g} en el panel de armas con {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Cuando elijas un objetivo, aparecerá una ayuda emergente que detallará tus probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} en dicho enemigo y el posible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de un impacto con éxito. Pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} al seleccionar a un enemigo para disparar. La cantidad de daño que inflijan tus personajes depende de los parámetros del arma que utilicen. La {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectividad{/g} del tiro varía según la distancia entre el personaje y su oponente. Cuando elijas como objetivo a un enemigo para un ataque de un solo tiro, aparecerán dos áreas que marcan los alcances de disparo efectivo y máximo.
languages.original_text: To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

traits.locale_text: Para atacar, selecciona primero el icono de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g} en el panel de armas con {console_bind|DPadX}. Cuando elijas un objetivo, aparecerá un mensaje que detallará tus probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} en dicho enemigo y el posible daño que ejerza un impacto con éxito. Pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} al seleccionar a un enemigo para disparar. La cantidad de daño que inflijan tus personajes depende de los parámetros del arma que utilicen. La efectividad del tiro varía según la distancia entre el personaje y su oponente. Cuando elijas como objetivo a un enemigo para un ataque de un solo tiro, aparecerán dos áreas que marcan los {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcances{/g} de disparo efectivo y máximo.

languages.text: 攻撃するには、まず武器パネルの{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}アイコンを{console_bind|DPadHorizontal}を使って選択する。敵に照準を当てるとツールチップが表示され、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する確率と、命中したときに与えられる可能性のある{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を確認できる。標的となる敵を選択したら{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。 キャラクターが与えるダメージ量は、使用する武器のパラメータによって変わる。ショットの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、キャラクターと敵の距離によって変わる。単発射撃の標的として敵に照準を当てると、武器の有効射程と最大射程を示す2つのエリアが表示される。
languages.original_text: To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃するには、まず武器パネルの{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}アイコンを{console_bind|DPadX}を使って選択する。敵に照準を当てるとポップアップが表示され、{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する確率と、命中したときに与えられる可能性のあるダメージを確認できる。標的となる敵を選択したら{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。 キャラクターが与えるダメージ量は、使用する武器のパラメータによって変わる。ショットの効果は、キャラクターと敵の距離によって変わる。単発射撃の標的として敵に照準を当てると、武器の有効射程と最大{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}を示す2つのエリアが表示される。

languages.text: 若要进行攻击，首先按下{console_bind|DPadHorizontal}，选择武器面板上的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}图标。之后选择目标敌人，弹出的提示会显示{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标的几率，以及成功命中之后可能造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。选好目标敌人之后，按下{console_bind|Confirm}即可开火。 角色造成的伤害，取决于角色装备武器的属性。射击效果的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}有效程度{/g}，取决于您的角色与敌人之间的距离。当您瞄准敌人进行单发射击时，您会看到两片区域，分别代表武器的有效射程与武器的最大射程。
languages.original_text: To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

traits.locale_text: 若要进行攻击，首先按下{console_bind|DPadX}，选择武器面板上的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}图标。之后选择目标敌人，弹出的窗口会显示{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标的几率，以及成功命中之后可能造成的伤害。选好目标敌人之后，按下{console_bind|Confirm}即可开火。 角色造成的伤害，取决于角色装备武器的属性。射击效果的有效程度，取决于您的角色与敌人之间的距离。当您瞄准敌人进行单发射击时，您会看到两片区域，分别代表武器的有效{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}与武器的最大射程。

languages.text: Um anzugreifen, wähle zuerst das {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss-{/g}Symbol auf dem Waffen-Panel mit {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Nimm einen Feind ins Visier – ein Tooltipp zeigt an, wie hoch deine Chancen sind, den Feind zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, und wie viel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} du bei einem erfolgreichen Treffer zufügen kannst. Drücke zum Feuern {console_bind|Confirm}, wenn du den Feind auswählst. Die Höhe des Schadens, den deine Charaktere verursachen, hängt von den Parametern der Waffe ab, die sie benutzen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektivität{/g} des Schusses hängt von der Distanz zwischen dem Charakter und seinem Feind ab – wenn du einen Feind mit einem Einzelschuss anvisierst, siehst du zwei Bereiche, die die effektive und maximale Reichweite der Waffe angeben.
languages.original_text: To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

traits.locale_text: Um anzugreifen, wähle zuerst das {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss-{/g}Symbol auf dem Waffen-Panel mit {console_bind|DPadX}. Nimm einen Gegner ins Visier – ein Pop-up zeigt an, wie hoch deine Chancen sind, den Gegner zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, und wie viel Schaden du bei einem erfolgreichen Treffer zufügen kannst. Drücke zum Feuern {console_bind|Confirm}, wenn du den Gegner auswählst. Die Höhe des Schadens, den deine Charaktere verursachen, hängt von den Parametern der Waffe ab, die sie benutzen. Die Effektivität des Schusses hängt von der Distanz zwischen dem Charakter und seinem Gegner ab – wenn du einen Gegner mit einem Einzelschuss anvisierst, siehst du zwei Bereiche, die die effektive und maximale {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} der Waffe angeben.

languages.text: Pour attaquer, sélectionnez d'abord l'icône {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tir au coup par coup{/g} dans le panneau des armes à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Ciblez un ennemi. Une fenêtre contextuelle s'affiche pour vous indiquer vos chances de porter un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à cet ennemi et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} possibles en cas de succès. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} lorsque vous sélectionnez l'ennemi pris pour cible. Les dégâts infligés par vos personnages dépendent des paramètres de l'arme qu'ils utilisent. L'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efficacité{/g} du tir dépend de la distance entre le personnage et son ennemi. Lorsque vous ciblez un ennemi avec un tir au coup par coup, deux zones indiquent les portées de tir effective et maximale de l'arme.
languages.original_text: To attack, first select the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} icon on the weapons panel using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}. Target an enemy — a tooltip will appear showing your chances of {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hitting{/g} that enemy and the possible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} you can deal on a successful hit. Press {console_bind|Confirm} when selecting the enemy to fire. The amount of damage your characters deal depends on the parameters of the weapon they are using. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} of the shot depends on the distance between the character and their enemy — when you target an enemy with a single shot, you will see two areas denoting the weapon's effective and maximum firing ranges.

traits.locale_text: Pour attaquer, sélectionnez d'abord l'icône {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tir au coup par coup{/g} dans le panneau des armes à l’aide de {console_bind|DPadX}. Ciblez un ennemi. Une fenêtre contextuelle s'affichera pour vous indiquer vos chances de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}toucher{/g} cet ennemi et les dégâts possibles en cas de succès. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} lorsque vous sélectionnez l'ennemi pris pour cible. Les dégâts infligés par vos personnages dépendent des paramètres de l'arme qu'ils utilisent. L'efficacité du tir dépend de la distance entre le personnage et son ennemi. Lorsque vous ciblez un ennemi avec un tir au coup par coup, vous verrez deux zones indiquant les {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portées{/g} de tir efficace et maximale de l'arme.
